means: 暗示，暗指( imply的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Exports in June rose 1.5%, implying that the economy was stronger than many investors had realized.
sentence.Network_cn: 6月份出口上升1.5%，表明经济比许多投资者所认为的更要坚挺。

sentence.Network_en: "Are you implying that I have something to do with those attacks?" she asked coldly.
sentence.Network_cn: “你在暗示我和那些袭击有关吗？”她冷冷地问。

sentence.Network_en: You seem to be implying, in your usual circumspect manner, that perhaps it might not be a wonderful idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 你好像正以你一贯谨言慎行的方式暗示，那个主意也许不怎么样。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当我们谈生命体的时候，严格意义上，我们不能讲生命“是”什么，生命总是“是”并且“蕴含着”(implying)什么。生命总是在开展的过程中…

list.abs: 隐含作者（implied author）是美国文学理论家韦恩·布斯（Wayne Booth）在《小说修辞学》（1961）中提出的概念，用来指称一种人 …
人力资源术语英汉对照 - MBA智库百科 ... Impasse： 僵持 Implied authority： 隐含职权 Incentive plan： 激励计划.
国贸名词 ... hypermarket 特级市场 implied terms 默示条款 import duty 入口税.
保险辞典 _ 圈中人保险网 ... ·安全装置（ safety） ·暗示担保；默示保证（ implied warranty） ·暗示合同（ implied contract）.
译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... encumbrance 担保权益 implied warranty 默示担保 incidental damages 附带损害.

entry.def: If you imply that something is the case, you say something which indicates that it is the case in an indirect way.

example.ex: 'Are you implying that I have something to do with those attacks?' she asked coldly...
example.tran: “你在暗示我和那些袭击有关吗？”她冷冷地问。

example.ex: She felt undermined by the implied criticism.
example.tran: 她觉得这一含沙射影的批评对自己造成了不利影响。

entry.def: If an event or situation implies that something is the case, it makes you think it likely that it is the case.

example.ex: Exports in June rose 1.5%, implying that the economy was stronger than many investors had realized...
example.tran: 6 月份出口上升 1.5%,表明经济比许多投资者所认为的更要坚挺。

example.ex: A 'frontier-free' Europe implies a greatly increased market for all economic operators.
example.tran: “无国界的”欧洲对所有经营者来说都意味着一个大大扩展了的市场。
